description: After receiving a formal declaration of the Alliance between the Empire and Nazarick`s newly-founded Sorcerer Kingdom, along with demands to formally cede the territory surrounding E-Rantel to Sorcerer King Ainz Ooal Gown, the Re-Estize Kingdom begins preparations for war. Having witnessed Gown`s strength first-hand and seeing no chance for victory, Gazef Stronoff pleads with the court to accede to his demands, but is powerless to stop the events set in motion.
